name: 3D Platformer (davidoh)
description:
3D Platformer project for MSU CAS 117

Proposed Modifications:

  1. Add 2 new levels that ramp up in difficulty, slowly introducing the moving platforms and the enemies
  2. Add a power up that somehow increases the jumping capability of the character (Examples: increasing jump height, adding a triple jump )
  3. Add a power up that somehow helps the player in fighting enemies (Examples: temporary invincibility, damaging enemies by running into them)

Credits

  • Created by David Oh
  • Art, audio, and scripts from MSU CAS 117 taught by Professor Brian Winn
